name: Bathroom & Laundry
Area barricaded off to allow no access to balconies with signs posted/ visible to include date of application
Surface Preparation as per Application Guide
Substrate clean, dry and free from dust.
Ensure no high points or crevices are in the substrate
Ensure substrate is structurally sound and ready to receive membrane
Ensure Humidity, temperature and moisture are in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations prior to primer - Add photos & have signed by Aland
Apply Primer (Polybit Polyprime)
Ensure all floor wastes and pipes have been primed in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations (Polybit PVC prime)
Shower & door angle in correct position and level. Angles to be 1.6mm gauge aluminium
All corners sealed with Polybit hydraflex as per manufacturer's recommendations
Apply first coat of membrane (Polybit Hydraguard) with minimum 150mm kicker around walls
Waterproof walls of shower section up to 1.8m/ceiling. Seal taps and the like. 2x coats required.
Min 50mm past shower screen has been waterproofed
Waterproof all shower and adjacent walls
Apply final coat of membrane (Polybit Hydraguard)
Allow curing in accordance with manufacturer's specification 24-48 hours min
Carry out dry film thickness test using Positector coating thickness inspection instrument - a total dry film thickness of 1.1mm (1500 microns) in two finished coats.
Flood testing completed
Balcony & Podium
Area barricaded off to allow no access to balconies with signs posted/ visible to include date of application. "No access Waterproofing work in progress"
Surface Preparation as per Application Guide
Substrate clean, dry and free from dust.
Ensure no high points or crevices are in the substrate
Ensure substrate is structurally sound and ready to receive membrane
Ensure Humidity, temperature and moisture are in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations prior to primer
Hold Point do not proceed if above has not been signed off
Primer (Polybit Polyprime) to all surfaces as per manufacturer's specifications and guidelines
Ensure all floor wastes and pipes have been primed in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations
Overflow at the ends of balustrades in place
All corners, joints, gaps and cracks to be treated with a flexible polyurethane sealant Polybit Hyrdaflex
Ensure Humidity, temperature and moisture are in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations prior to first coat
First coat of selected Membrane (Polybit Hydraguard) to entire areas as per manufacturer's recommendations
Allow the membrane coat to dry min 12 hours check the tackiness before applying next coat
Ensure Humidity, temperature and moisture are in accordance with manufacturer's recommendations prior to second coat (Polybit Hydraguard)
Apply final coat of (Polybit Hydraguard) as per coverage specified in manufacturer's recommendations
Carry out dry film thickness test using Positector coating thickness inspection instrument
Rectification of defective works for failure of flood test & rectification works completed
